notary_public.name: Holly Inzer
notary_public.sworn_statement: Display ads for the above account were made through the aforesaid newspaper during the month of January 1988 as follows:
notary_public.certification: We hereby certify charges shown above on dates per attached bill are true and correct as billed to the account in upper right hand corner of the affidavit and are exclusive New Albany Tribune advertisements
notary_public.testimony: IN TESTIMONY WHEREOF I have set my hand and seal the day and year aforesaid.
